Question: The film opened in eight theaters in Texas (the home state of both this person and Wilson), and earned US $6,422.
Hints: Initially, this person planned to release a new studio album that would end her contract with her label, Epic Records.
On February 1, 2004, this person opened the Super Bowl XXXVIII halftime show.
In November 2007, this person began dating Dallas Cowboys quarterback Tony Romo.
